game.player

Class TablePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.player.TablePlayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Human, Seer, Werewolf, Witch

    public class TablePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a Player. A Player saves his name, a status (alive or dead), a role, a vote status ( true or false) and the amount of votes against him.

        public TablePlayer(java.lang.String firstName,
                   java.lang.String status,
                   java.lang.String role,
                   java.lang.Integer voteAgainst,
                   java.lang.Boolean hasVoted)
        Constructor for creating an object of this class
        Parameters:
        firstName - : Name of this player
        status - : status of this player ( alive or dead )
        role - : Role of this player ( Seer, Human, Werewolf or Witch )
        voteAgainst - : The amount of votes against this player
        hasVoted - : Status of this player's vote ( true or false )
